page.title: 01NewMill,Shepley,Thurstonland
page.content: This area is located 5to 6 miles South-East of Huddersfield and approximatetly 20 miles North of Sheffield. The area is mainly rural with scattered villages and hamlets lying on the Eastern foothills of the Pennines.The three major settlements are New Mill,Shepley and Thurstonland. The main Huddersfield-Sheffield Railway Line passes through Shepley,and the area is served by a number of local Bus Companies. There are a number of local industries but the majority of the work force from these villages commute to the nearby towns.
